message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a fantastic deal for $120.
I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105.
I'm still interested in the product, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $95.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $99.
